first.title: Encrypted payments
first.description: All transactions are secured end-to-end, keeping your payment details private and protected at every step.

second.title: Verified organisations
second.description: Businesses go through verification checks, helping you trust who you’re buying tickets from.

third.title: Scannable tickets
third.description: Tickets come with unique QR codes that can be downloaded and scanned securely at entry points.

details3.title: From Discovery to Access All in One Flow

faq.answer-1: Creating an account and browsing activities is free. Ticket prices and any applicable fees are shown clearly before checkout.
faq.question-2: Do I need an account to buy tickets?
faq.answer-2: Yes. You need a TicketWaze account to purchase tickets so you can access, manage, and validate them securely.
faq.question-3: Can I buy multiple tickets at once?
faq.answer-3: Yes, you can purchase multiple tickets in a single order, depending on the activity's limits.
faq.answer-4: Refunds depend on the activity's refund policy set by the organizer. Please check the activity details before purchasing.
faq.answer-5: Yes. TicketWaze uses secure payment processing and does not store sensitive card information.

footer.description: From platform updates to new activities, we’ll keep you informed without the noise.

hero.title: Reimagining how tickets and access work
hero.description: TicketWaze was created to remove unnecessary friction from how access is bought and sold, from personal experiences to business operations, bringing payments, tickets, and management into one simple, reliable platform.

details1.title1: Built on principles that guide every
details1.description: These values shape how the platform is designed, built, and trusted.

first.title: Trust first
first.description: Security, verification, and fraud prevention are built into the system — not added as an afterthought.

second.title: User clarity over complexity
second.description: Every flow is designed to be simple, intuitive, and easy to understand, even for first-time users.

third.title: Cultural and language inclusion
third.description: The platform is built to work across regions, languages, and payment behaviors — without forcing one global pattern.

fourth.title: Financial transparency
fourth.description: Clear pricing, visible payouts, and real-time tracking so users always know where their money is.

details2.title: Adopted across regions, languages, and payments
details2.region: regions actively supported across local markets
details2.languages: languages available for users and organisations
details2.payments: payments methods enabled for seamless transactions

first.description: Buying tickets on TicketWaze feels effortless. I can pay quickly, save my tickets, and even share them with friends without stress.
first.name: Mike Jane

second.description: TicketWaze helped us move from manual bookings to a structured system. Payments, access, and reporting are all in one place.
second.name: Billy Jean

third.description: What sold us was the flexibility. We’re not limited to events — we sell sessions, passes, and experiences seamlessly.
third.name: Bandana
